roleset.name: to indicate by signs
roleset.note: PORTEND-V NOTES: Frames file for 'portend' based on survey of sentences in the WSJ corpus. (from portend.01-v predicate notes)

example.name: all arguments
example.text: He said [0] last week 's activity in gold could portend a move to $ 390 [*U*]an ounce for the December contract .

example.name: transitive
example.text: This portends consequences from what we have already done [*T*-2] that [*T*-1]will be very destabilizing to social and economic systems .
example.arg: consequences from what we have already done [*T*-2] that [*T*-1]will be very destabilizing to social and economic systems
